channel.title: Update Logger v0.5 (Java)
channel.description:
Eyeownyew's Update Logger v0.5
This is written in Java.
Purpose: Ease the annoyance of remembering dates when logging, and putting them into format.
Has basic features:
-Logs Input -Date/Time (Chronologically sorted, as well) -Reloads previous logs on startup -Capitalization/Punctuation
To add: -BBCode 'list' generator -File changing -Different view format (View button) -Copy to Clipboard command
Note: This is only v0.5.. Don't flame if it's not seemingly non-useful to you, it may be eventually.
Please give suggestions. ;)
EDIT: Forgot link. Lmao. http://www.mediafire.com/?y1tmtqbrrzwtt35

item.title: Update Logger v0.5 (Java)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:7, topic:377089”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=473003.msg3462535#msg3462535 date=1294594883]

Theres time/date in the bottom right of your computer…

Yeah, but it’s formatted in this so that you don’t have to write it down.
[/quote]

So your going to carry around a pc, everywhere you go just to see what the time is and date? :S
and why would you need to write it down? 1 glance at the date and you should know it, and buy a watch or a phone for time…
I don’t see it as very useful but if it is for you, then i see why you made it.[/quote]

It’s not meant to be something new or exciting.
It’s meant for convenience.

Read full topic

Theres time/date in the bottom right of your computer…
[/quote]

Yeah, but it’s formatted in this so that you don’t have to write it down.[/quote]

So your going to carry around a pc, everywhere you go just to see what the time is and date? :S
and why would you need to write it down? 1 glance at the date and you should know it, and buy a watch or a phone for time…
I don’t see it as very useful but if it is for you, then i see why you made it.

item.title: Update Logger v0.5 (Java)
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

glestrts:

Meh, I am still at a loss as to when I would use this but cool i guess

It’s not necessarily needed very often.
I made this because I find it a pain to either remember dates or jot them down, so this does that for you.
The only thing you have to do is type in your update, and it formats it.

That’s basically the only reason for this… And that it’s one of the only things I could think of that hasn’t been developed yet, could teach me more about Java, and could be useful to various types of people on some occasion.

Read full topic
